essays.title: Supporting Statement
essays.prompt: Please provide a supporting statement that tells us about your motivation for studying the MBA and what you will contribute to the Oxford MBA community.

essays.title: Additional Essay 1
essays.prompt: Tell us about a time when you had to make a difficult decision and what you learned from it.

essays.title: Additional Essay 2
essays.prompt: Tell us about a time when you had to work with a diverse group of people and what you learned from the experience.

essays.title: Reapplicant Essay
essays.prompt: If you are reapplying, please tell us what has changed since your last application.
